title: Is Sir Kled supposed to be what Kled would be like if he was demacian?
body: Kinda like how poppy has Noxus poppy?

replies.body: It's more of a classic knight - like Knight Amumu a bit? The windmill in the background is a nod to Don Quixote.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=VuxK7ybZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-20T16:41:35.290+0000)
>
> It's more of a classic knight - like Knight Amumu a bit? The windmill in the background is a nod to Don Quixote.

And his look a nod to Arthur from Ghosts and Goblins and Skaarl a nod to Chocobos, amirite?
What can I say we love video games >:)
I'm glad you didn't leave him in underwear when Skaarl runs away xD
That's such a good idea! Where were you when we were making the skin :o
I'm already employed, but I'm always here if you need suggestions! :P
Off topic, but have you thought of a story regarding gem skins such as Ashe, Taric, and maybe Lissandra? Older skin lines in general that aren't pop culture references.

Actually as part of the work Thermal Kitten, King Kut and myself are doing we were working on a big wall of thematics and Thermal Kitten wrote up 'Gem Skins'. Emerald Taric sort of got reworked into an Elderwood-adjacent Elf but I don't know where the other skins fit in, or if Blight Crystal Varus is considered connected. Similarly Blood Stone Taric was framed in a castlevania/gothic kind of setting.

If they did comprise some unique world where magic is drawn from crystal power a'la Tekkaman Blade, what would that world be and what is the significance of the different crystals?

No offense, but I never would've connected Emerald Taric to the Elderwood world.

In my view, maybe the gem world is more of a kingdom? Maybe two? Ashe could lead one, and use her gem to protect others, while Lissandra could be another queen or witch who uses blood stone (could be a living, parasitic stone, or made out of blood) to cover the kingdom or world in it. Blight Crystal could be a parasitic stone that corrupted Varus into trying to cover the world in that brand of crystal.

Have you thought about expanding the Arctic Ops skins? What are your thoughts on the ninja skins like Stinger Akali and Yellow Jacket Shen?

Yeah it was actually a conversation between Skins and Champ Up. There's so many projects at Riot we do our best to align on things but at the end of the day we have to trust everyone is working towards the same goals. So as I said, Elderwood _adjacent_ which is actually cool because it suggests that the Elderwood exists in a bigger world, a world that might have multiple woods (I'm thinking of Blackthorn Morgana) and perhaps even [crystal castles](https://youtu.be/zl0kc1EQ1js).

Thanks for sharing your thoughts about it, I think there's something really cool there.

Every year I pitch some arctic ops concepts, so I think one of these days it'll be time to give Varus some backup. It's definitely a cool theme. I actually worked on the concept for Yellow Jacket Shen when Shen had his update as luck would have it, I tried to add a wasp motif and the subsequent splash sort of depicts him in command of a **swarm** of ninjas. While I know this wasn't originally part of the design (a design which I loved) we decided there needed to be something _original_ added to the old recolour.

Combine:
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/steven-universe/images/b/bf/New_MC_Banner.png/revision/latest?cb=20160910182705
with:
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/marvel_dc/images/5/5e/Amethyst_Princess_of_Gemworld_4.jpg
And you will have a solid gold thematic world to operate in.
I think we should get get the voice actor for kled back and have them do a Don Quixote themed VO, that would be awesome.

I don't think Noxian Poppy really delivers on that theme at all, she just has Juggalo facepaint, black armor, and black hair. It's really more fitting in a "Goth" skin line (with Goth Annie and Emumu)

I feel like the skin was a HUGELY Missed opportunity.
If they had added in some dark red VFX Ala Katarina, it would have delivered SO MUCH better.
But tbh every Poppy skin except for Battle Regalia feels like that. Her VU was full of skins lacking love, effort and attention.
Similar to what Sejuani is going through right now. 

But tbh considering Poppy's base personality I think Noxus Poppy was always going to be a pretty 'meh' skin as it simply does not translate well.

other skins are fine
